categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Galaxies

nodes.text: Noolawaw Laoo was a male Ithorian droid engineer who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Dialogue pertaining to Noolawaw Laoo appeared in the directory tree files for the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. However, he never actually appeared on the video game's live servers as a proper non-player character.
